data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Sambhal who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sambhal, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Sambhal to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary: On average, 46 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Sambhal, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, teach the 2,430 believers in Sambhal that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, bless the county of Sambhal with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Brahmin Sawaria people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Brahmin Sawaria people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Brahmin Sawaria people is yours.
Spirit, train the church of Sambhal, Uttar Pradesh, India to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Sambhal access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Sambhal, Uttar Pradesh, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Sambhal
location.people_groups_list: Gadaria (Hindu traditions), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions), Rajbhar, Faqir, Gadaria Dhingar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gadaria (Hindu traditions) (6,571,000), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions) (1,800), Rajbhar (73,000), Faqir (90,000), Gadaria Dhingar (1,188,000)
